about_the_game:
Humanity found itself in a quagmire. Electric storms covered most of the planet, world wars, revolutions and endless greed led to the collapse of civilizations. The really dark ages have come, illuminated by electric flashes and lightning.
The middle of the XX century, an alternative story, we play as a girl Anya, an electrician in a small neighborhood.. Trains do not run, they are chained at stations with huge chains. Their task now is to extract energy from electric shutters. People have already forgotten that the railway was created to move between cities.

Anya learns that Trains are not just power plants, if they are released and put on rails, they will help clear the world of electric storms and pull humanity out of the Dark Ages. But would they believe her? Do the survivors want change?

Find the answers and make your decision in the busy world of electropunk.

Gameplay

You play as Anna and have to free Trains at stations. You will meet a variety of enemies and new friends will help you.

Use the Gauss-pistol and modify it. Shoot further and more accurately or hit enemy soldiers with a volley of needles.

You can use the power of the magnetic field to throw heavy objects at enemies, create a protective shield and even levitate!

Drive Trains to move between stations. Solve electrical puzzles and quests.

name: TRAINS: Electrostorm
short_description: The dark ages have come, illuminated by electric flashes. Embark on an adventure with Anya, the only electrohuman! You must free the Trains and light a bright Star in the darkness of the electric storms.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Indonesian*, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Japanese*, Hindi*
*languages with full audio support
